briefTitle: Intravenous Immunoglobulin (IVIG, Bioven) Efficacy and Safety in Chronic Primary Immune Thrombocytopenia (ITP) in Adults

armGroups.label: Main Group
interventionNames: Drug: Intravenous immunoglobulin (IVIG), 10% solution for infusion

outcomeMeasures.title: Part (Percent) of Patients With Response (R)
outcomeMeasures.description: platelet count \>30 x 109 /l and at least 2-fold increase of the baseline count, confirmed on at least 2 separate occasions at least 7 days apart, and absence of bleeding

outcomeMeasures.title: Part (Percent) of Patients With Complete Response (CR)
outcomeMeasures.description:
platelet count \>100 x 109 /l, confirmed on at least 2 separate occasions at least 7 days apart, and absence of bleeding. Complete response (CR) was achieved in 13 patients during the study.

CR = 13/32 = 40.63 % (23,61%; 57,64%) This corresponds 40,63% from total number of patients. The confidence interval for this value is 23.61% to 57.64%

outcomeMeasures.title: Part (Percent) of Patients With no Response (NR)
outcomeMeasures.description: platelet count \< 30 x 109/L or less than a 2-fold increase of the baseline count. It should be confirmed by at least 2 blood tests or presence of bleeding

outcomeMeasures.title: Part (Percent) of Patients With Loss of Response (R)
outcomeMeasures.description: Decreasing platelet count (\< 30 x 109/L or less than a 2-fold increase of the baseline count) or development of bleeding. Platelet count should be confirmed at least two times, with an interval of 1 day.

outcomeMeasures.title: Part (Percent) of Patients With Loss of Complete Response (CR)
outcomeMeasures.description: decreased platelet count \<100 x 109/L or development of bleeding

outcomeMeasures.title: Time (in Days) From Treatment Start to Response (R)
outcomeMeasures.description: Time calculated from first infusion (treatment start) to the day when the response (R) criteria are achieved

outcomeMeasures.title: Time (in Days) From Treatment to Complete Response (CR)
outcomeMeasures.description: Time calculated from first infusion (treatment start) to the day when the complete response (CR) criteria are achieved

outcomeMeasures.title: Duration (in Days) of Response (R)
outcomeMeasures.description: Time calculated from the day when the complete response (R) criteria are achieved, to the day when loss of complete response (R) criteria is achieved

outcomeMeasures.title: Duration (in Days) of Complete Response (CR)
outcomeMeasures.description: Time calculated from the day when the complete response (CR) criteria are achieved, to the day when loss of complete response (CR) criteria are achieved

outcomeMeasures.title: Frequency (Percent) of Adverse Events
outcomeMeasures.description: Part of the drug administration cases with adverse events, from all cases of study drug administration

outcomeMeasures.title: Frequency of Serious Adverse Events
outcomeMeasures.description: Part of the drug administration cases with serious adverse events, from all cases of study drug administration
